text: The Column () is a 1968 Romanian German drama movie directed by Mircea Drăgan and starring Richard Johnson, Antonella Lualdi, Ilarion Ciobanu, Amedeo Nazzari, Ștefan Ciubotărașu, Florin Piersic, Amza Pellea, Emil Botta. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 drama movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies set in Ancient Rome Category:Movies set in Romania Category:Movies set in the 2nd century Category:Movies directed by Mircea Drăgan
title: The Column
